MAILTO=problems
# This touches a filename in the temp directory so that you can see cron is
# working if the timestamp is current. Comment it out if it bugs you. :^)
* * * * *	touch /karchan/tmp/.crond_running

#50 23 * * *	/etc/webalizer.script

#* * * * *	/karchan/mud/backgroundserv check

# Check for users that have been inactive for over an hour
0,15,30,45 * * * *	/karchan/mud/cleanup.characters
